item.title: PowerShell Logging
item.description: Lately, I’ve been doing a lot of PowerShell scripting, and it’s given me the chance to expand my experience and exposure to best practices. One of the key areas I’ve focused on is logging — something that’s often overlooked but incredibly valuable when troubleshooting or reviewing script performance.

item.title: Automating Azure App Registrations with PowerShell
item.description:
It has been a while since I last blogged - life has certainly been busy!

Over the past two years I’ve somewhat immersed myself in PowerShell. While I wouldn’t claim to be a PowerShell Guru, my knowledge has substantially grown, thanks in part to splendid collaboration with some exceptional colleagues.
